paper_abstract: A miniaturized microstrip antenna on a planar layered periodic structure is proposed, designed and fabricated. The proposed structure miniaturizes patch antennas in the microwave band. With varying the parameters of the proposed structure, the achieved miniaturization factor can be adjusted in the range 2.6-4.2. Numerical and experimental results are presented. (c) 2012 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Int J RF and Microwave CAE, 2013.
paper_title: Proximity effects of a layered periodic structure on miniaturization of patch antennas
